basics.name: Osama Nusair
basics.label: Cyber Security Researcher/Engineer
basics.summary: A cyber security researcher/engineer with a passion for technology and a commitment to staying up-to-date with evolving digital world and its threat landscape. I bring a diverse range of skills, experience and knowledge that have been developed over the years through both my formal education and professional experience.

work.name: Birmingham City University
work.summary: Engaged with undergraduate students and practically demonstrated lab sessions on Ethical Hacking and Network Security courses.

work.name: AirOverflow
work.summary: As a founder of cyber security startup, I had a privilege to provide services to the industry and develop some cutting edge products.

work.name: NATIONAL AND VOCATIONAL TECHNICAL TRAINING CENTRE (NAVTTC)
work.summary: Taught Ethical Hacking & Defense course to students from different backgrounds. Following modules were covered

work.name: NATIONAL CENTRE FOR CYBER SECURITY (NCCS)
work.summary: Research and development on smartphone digital forensic tools.

volunteer.summary: Pioneer President for Air University Cyber Security Society. Led a team of 12 to establish strong roots for the society and organized multiple events.

education.institution: Birmingham City University, Birmingham, United Kingdom

awards.title: Digital Pakistan Cybersecurity Hackathon 2021
awards.summary: Won first ever Digital Pakistan Cybersecurity Hackathon in 2021.

projects.name: Honeypot Strategies for Edge Network Devices
projects.summary: Research & Development of honeypot strategies for edge network devices.
